title: Hello, World!
problem_statement: Write a program that prints exactly: Hello, World!
constraints: Output must exactly match. No additional spaces or characters.

title: Simple Addition
problem_statement: Write a program that takes two integers as input and prints their sum.
constraints: Must read input from standard input. No hardcoded values.

title: Even or Odd
problem_statement: Write a program that checks if a given integer is even or odd.
constraints: Use conditional statements. Do not hardcode outputs.

title: Factorial Calculation
problem_statement: Write a program that calculates the factorial of a given number.
constraints: Use loops or recursion. Do not use pre-built factorial functions.

title: Find the Largest Number
problem_statement: Write a program that takes three integers as input and prints the largest one.
constraints: Use conditional statements. No built-in max functions.

title: Reverse a String
problem_statement: Write a program that reverses a given string.
constraints: Use loops or slicing. No built-in reverse functions.

title: Multiplication Table
problem_statement: Write a program that prints the multiplication table of a given number up to 10.

title: Palindrome Check
problem_statement: Write a program that checks if a given string is a palindrome.
constraints: Use loops or string manipulation. No built-in palindrome functions.

title: Sum of Digits
problem_statement: Write a program that calculates the sum of digits of a given number.
constraints: Use loops or recursion. No built-in sum functions.

title: Prime Number Check
problem_statement: Write a program that checks if a given number is prime.
constraints: Use loops and conditions. No built-in prime check functions.

title: Fibonacci Series
problem_statement: Write a program that prints the first N Fibonacci numbers.
constraints: Use loops or recursion. No built-in Fibonacci functions.

title: GCD Calculation
problem_statement: Write a program that calculates the Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) of two numbers.
constraints: Use loops or recursion. No built-in GCD functions.

title: Binary to Decimal Conversion
problem_statement: Write a program that converts a binary number to decimal.
constraints: Use loops or mathematical conversion. No built-in functions.

title: Sorting an Array
problem_statement: Write a program that sorts an array of integers in ascending order.
constraints: Use sorting algorithms like Bubble Sort or Selection Sort. No built-in sort functions.

title: Count Vowels in a String
problem_statement: Write a program that counts the number of vowels in a given string.
constraints: Use loops and conditions. No built-in vowel count functions.
